weapons.name: potential manuport
weapons.description: It looks like this rock wants a passage. As long as you keep it with you, it will protect you.

weapons.name: polarized sheet
weapons.description: It's a polarized sheet. It shows Fattuzu in light.

weapons.name: sharp polyhedron
weapons.description: You should never leave your house without a sharp polyhedron in your pocket.

weapons.name: armored manuport
weapons.description: << I'm a hitchhiker, can you give me a lift... please? >>

weapons.name: transparent polygon
weapons.description: Splits light into colored beams that blind enemies. Polarized sunglasses recommended.

weapons.name: armored brench
weapons.description: It looks the same as any armored branch you've seen before. It hurts a lot when used with dexterity.

weapons.name: Aperture Science Handheld Portal Device
weapons.description: It looks like the Zero Point Energy Field Manipulator but besides lifting things it opens portals... Of course it doesn't work, but you can effectively slam it into things.

weapons.name: Deliverance by Tediore (Shotgun)
weapons.description: Allow me to deliver my bullet to your head.

weapons.name: tesseract
weapons.description: Is an Optical Character Recognition tool. That is, it will recognize and read the text embedded in images. Did you think it was a deadly weapon like in The Cube?

weapons.name: great attractor
weapons.description: It's a gravitational anomaly in intergalactic space and the apparent central gravitational point of the Laniakea Supercluster.

weapons.name: The Soul Cube
weapons.description: Is an ancient Martian artifact and the most powerful weapon in Doom 3.
